summary: alex, posting something that’s not sanders sides??? w o w yes i do have other interests lol, hi i like bnha and i liked being...
body:
alex, posting something that’s not sanders sides??? w o w

yes i do have other interests lol, hi i like bnha and i liked being part of the Tododeku Big Bang ( @tododekubigbang) i got to meet more people and i got to do art for a friNKING D&D FIC (i also love d&d lmao) by @apomaro-mellow

please im begging you if you like bnha read it, it’s so good im love (found here)

i want to do another art piece for this fic but ive been uh.. busy, i have another project comin that im posting shortly and yeah words

thanks dude for being a great partner <3 im so glad i got to work on your fic!

summary: could you write something about shoji and how he would react to his crush flirting/back hugging him please and thank you
question: could you write something about shoji and how he would react to his crush flirting/back hugging him please and thank you
answer:
• He’s definitely not used to being flirted with. He’s worried sometimes that he looks scary, so he never expects anything like that.
  • He’s more used to hugs. He’s very aware that he gives really good ones, given his size and his extra arms.
  • I imagine he’s not really that good at flirting. He seems like a more straight-forward sort of person, and I’m not sure he’d really know how to go about it.
  • So he just comes off sort of awkward and shy, though it’s kind of cute.
  • He gets kind of flustered when his crush flirts back, but he tries to keep cool. It’s not immediately obvious that he’s inwardly freaking out, which makes it all the more endearing.

  • So he just comes off sort of awkward and shy, though it’s kind of cute.
  • He gets kind of flustered when his crush flirts back, but he tries to keep cool. It’s not immediately obvious that he’s inwardly freaking out, which makes it all the more endearing.

  • I imagine he’s not really that good at flirting. He seems like a more straight-forward sort of person, and I’m not sure he’d really know how to go about it.
  • So he just comes off sort of awkward and shy, though it’s kind of cute.
  • He gets kind of flustered when his crush flirts back, but he tries to keep cool. It’s not immediately obvious that he’s inwardly freaking out, which makes it all the more endearing.

tags: boku no hero academia fantasy au
summary: Part 2 of Getsui Mogenei [BNHA OC] Fantasy AU
title: Part 2 of Getsui Mogenei [BNHA OC] Fantasy AU
body:
“NO!!!” 

The barbarian leaped up the stage, and the village boy drew his enchanted sword. The two made quick work of the poorly-trained guards. Suddenly, the clouds darkened considerably and a blistering wind blew through the square The crowd began to scream and run, as the barbarian and villager braced against the gust. The whirlwind circled around Getsui’s body, which was slowly lifted in the air.

“What’s happening?!” the village boy yelled over the storm. He noticed that her black pendant was a milky white. Thunder crashed into buildings near them, causing fires.

“What the hell?!” Cried the barbarian Black smoke crept from the shadows and swirled around the witch’s limp body. Voices seem to whisper and scream in the wind, and the village boy felt the power from his legendary sword begin to dim.

“Kacchan, something is wrong with All Might!”

“WHAT?!”

Another strike of lightning struck particularly close, forcing them to close their eyes and cover their ears. The wind suddenly blew the opposite harshly, before abruptly coming to a halt. The boys opened their eyes, and everything was exactly the way it was before, save the angry townspeople. There was no scorching from the lightning, the trees were still, and all was quiet. The witch laid on the ground, motionless.

“Mogenei!” the village boy cried. He rushed to her side, the barbarian following soon after. The villager, named Midoriya Izuku, slide down to the ground next to the body, and gingerly lifted Mogenei onto his lap. “Mogenei… no…” Midoriya started to tear up when he noticed that her brown-black hair started to turn into a snowy white color.

“What the…” The barbarian was about ready to unleash his wrath upon the people who hung Mogenei but was now only able to watch in bewilderment as the dark color was replaced the lighter one, fading from the root down. Shortly after her hair had gone completely white, the girl began to stir.

Mogenei’s eyelids twitched, and a groan came from her throat. She coughed weakly and turned her head away from the sun. “Mogenei!” Midoriya cried in relief and surprise. Upon hearing her name called, the witch’s eyes fluttered open.

“…Izuku?” her voice was barely above a whisper, but it confirmed she wasn’t dead. Izuku let a small sob escape his lips before pulling his friend up and into a hug. “Oof…”

“S-sorry!”

“What the hell just happened?” Mogenei turned her attention to Bakugou Katsuki, the barbarian. Midoriya gave Bakugou a look as if to say, ‘Dude, she just came back from the dead.’ Bakugou glared back at the village boy and turned back the mage, awaiting his answer.

“A ritual,” she replied simply, holding her head and acting as if resurrecting after being hanged was no big deal. Midoriya repeated her answer as a question, and she simply nodded. Bakugou growled impatiently, waiting for elaboration. Getsui Mogenei slowly and shakily attempted to stand, against Midoriya’s protests.

“JUST WHAT KIND OF RITUAL INVOLVES GETTING YOURSELF KILLED?!” he yelled at her.

Getsui opened her mouth to answer, “AA-AH-A! FUCK!” The witch suddenly hunched over and held her right forearm. She cursed and hissed as she fell back to her knees. Getsui’s right arm tensed and shook and she watched a mark burn onto her forearm’s skin, like some kind of branding. A ring with three smaller circles (resembling a bracelet with beads) at equal distance from each other, each one connected with a line, forming a triangle in the center.

“WHAT?!”

blog.name: quirkswriting
blog.title: eleutheromania.
blog.description: BOKU NO HERO ACADEMIA!

summary:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ shinsou hitoshi ˎˊ˗ 

  Anonymous said: “Hello! Can I request hitoshi being late for the readers date? And reader is...
body:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ shinsou hitoshi ˎˊ˗

Anonymous said: “Hello! Can I request hitoshi being late for the readers date? And reader is upset thinking he doesn’t like them?”

sure thing, sweetie!

∘⁺✧ mod cerulean

It has been an hour since you first arrived at the intended spot that they were supposed to meet at. You were looking down at your phone, dejected as you wait for any phone calls or text messages - anything to say that he was coming. You were the one who initiated the date, the first to ask him and now you were thinking that he only agreed to go on a date with you because he pitied you.

How naive and gullible you had been, excited to be on a date with someone you genuinely have a crush on - but now stood up, sitting all alone at one part of the park you were waiting with. You gripped onto the sleeves of your jacket, holding back the tears that are threatening to slip out and stood up, ready to leave the place and wondering if you could skip a day or two from school.

But then a voice called out.

You turned, hopeful and there he was - Shinsou Hitoshi, panting and jogging after you and calling out your name before you could leave. “Sorry,” he wheezed out, hands on his knees as he tried desperately to catch his breath. You looked at him wide-eyed, confused as to why he was running. “I’m sorry I was late. I got caught up talking to my sensei before realising the time.”

Shinsou straightened his back, looking down at you with a look of guilt and you smiled, grateful that at least he had remembered. “It’s alright,” was all you said, quick to forgive - like you always do. At least he cared. “It’s not too late to start the date.”

The lavender-haired male smiled, a little tired but held out his hand. “Let’s go then.”

trail.content_raw:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ shinsou hitoshi ˎˊ˗

Anonymous said: “Hello! Can I request hitoshi being late for the readers date? And reader is upset thinking he doesn’t like them?”

sure thing, sweetie!

∘⁺✧ mod cerulean

It has been an hour since you first arrived at the intended spot that they were supposed to meet at. You were looking down at your phone, dejected as you wait for any phone calls or text messages - anything to say that he was coming. You were the one who initiated the date, the first to ask him and now you were thinking that he only agreed to go on a date with you because he pitied you.

How naive and gullible you had been, excited to be on a date with someone you genuinely have a crush on - but now stood up, sitting all alone at one part of the park you were waiting with. You gripped onto the sleeves of your jacket, holding back the tears that are threatening to slip out and stood up, ready to leave the place and wondering if you could skip a day or two from school.

But then a voice called out.

You turned, hopeful and there he was - Shinsou Hitoshi, panting and jogging after you and calling out your name before you could leave. “Sorry,” he wheezed out, hands on his knees as he tried desperately to catch his breath. You looked at him wide-eyed, confused as to why he was running. “I’m sorry I was late. I got caught up talking to my sensei before realising the time.”

Shinsou straightened his back, looking down at you with a look of guilt and you smiled, grateful that at least he had remembered. “It’s alright,” was all you said, quick to forgive - like you always do. At least he cared. “It’s not too late to start the date.”

The lavender-haired male smiled, a little tired but held out his hand. “Let’s go then.”
trail.content:
• ₊°✧︡ ˗ˏˋ shinsou hitoshi ˎˊ˗

Shinsou straightened his back, looking down at you with a look of guilt and you smiled, grateful that at least he had remembered. “It’s alright,” was all you said, quick to forgive - like you always do. At least he cared. “It’s not too late to start the date.”

summary: 1-A had to take a class trip and the teachers ruled buses as too much of a target so they’re carpooling in the teachers’ cars...
body:
1-A had to take a class trip and the teachers ruled buses as too much of a target so they’re carpooling in the teachers’ cars (Aizawa has a fucking mom van and he got stuck with only one moral compass)

  • Aizawa is driving, Jiro’s in shotgun regulating the music, Midoriya and Todoroki are in the middle seats (Todoroki is on the verge of lighting on fire), and Bakugo and Kirishima are in the very back with Kaminari between them, to their dismay.
  • Kirishima and Kaminari are looking at memes and laughing uncontrollably and Bakugo’s struggling to not murder.
  • Every time they pass an animal, Kaminari points out the window and screams. Ex: “LOOK A SQUIRREL—“
  • Kaminari has requested multiple times to play “I Want It That Way” and every time Aizawa has been so thankful to have Jiro regulate the music.
  • One time Kaminari actually did get control and he played “Moto Moto” and that’s when Jiro was placed in charge of music.
  • Kaminari inexplicably has one of Kirishima’s crocs and literally no one knows why. He won’t tell them why and they’re starting to think he doesn’t know either.

I need more.
